column5: there were reports of a man drowning about 60m of Koh Rong. The incident occurred around 11.40 am. After being notified divers searched the area and found a body at around 3:15 pm on the west side of Koh Rong.------The man was named as MPILI ADIREL GARLEY EDNICK
column6: a 24-year-old male.  *reportedly a Congolese national. ------POST NEWS
